Description:
Detects possible Kerberos Replay Attack on the domain controllers when "KRB_AP_ERR_REPEAT" Kerberos response is sent to the client

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Replay Attack Detected
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '4649'
